title: Against the tide
creator_credit: Robert Tronson, Geoffrey Sumner and Interfilm
brief_description: Individual responsibility and teamwork are the twin themes in a film which links the continuous needs for safety precautions in the ever present dangers in life in the steel works and on the high seas.
